docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 27-- Christmas week brought a gift to the actor and politician in the form of a broadcast prompter. When someone blows his lines the prompter speaks to him, but not to the invisible audience.

headline.main: Prompter Talks to TV Speaker Out of Hearing of the Audience; To Chill the Patient

docs.abstract: Frenchman gets US patent for 'refrigerator bag' for use in treatment of some ills
docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Dec. 27-- Christmas week brought a gift to the actor and politician in the form of a broadcast prompter. When someone blows his lines the prompter speaks to him, but not to the invisible audience.

byline.original: By STACY V. JONES Special to The New York Times
